articles.title: Tim Cook’s Bad Year Keeps Getting Worse
articles.content: Tim Cook’s Bad Year Keeps Getting Worse

articles.title: Stocks to Watch: Apple, Booz Allen,  Constellation Energy, Intuit
articles.content: ↘️ Booz Allen (BAH): The company plans to cut roughly 2,500 jobs as it grapples with the effects of the Trump administration’s crackdown on federal contracting. Shares dropped more than 16%. ↘️ Apple (AAPL): President Trump racketed up pressure on Apple, saying iPhones manufactured abroad could face import taxes of at least 25%.

articles.title: Tim Cook Called Texas Governor to Stop Online Child-Safety Legislation
articles.content: Apple’s CEO called Texas Gov. Greg Abbott after a law passed requiring app stores to verify user ages.

articles.title: Trump Threatens Fresh Tariffs on EU, iPhones and Rival Devices
articles.content: President Trump fired new salvos in the global trade war, threatening a 50% tariff on imported goods from the European Union and new duties on iPhones and other smartphones made overseas.

articles.title: Stocks Take Another Tariff To The Shin
articles.content: Markets sagged again Friday after a fresh round of tariff threats landed like a sandbag, flattening retailers still wheezing from the last batch.

articles.title: US Equity Indexes Fall in Week on Treasury Market Jitters, Trump Warnings to EU, Apple
articles.content: US equity indexes fell this week as the White House's budget bill triggered jitters in the Treasury
